name: Wavebreakers Fin
description: A naginata forged from luminscent material deep in the ocean depths. It was once the possession of the tengu race.
refinements:
For every point of the entire party's combined maximum Energy capacity, the Elemental Burst DMG of the character equipping this weapon is increased by **0.12**
%. A maximum of **40**
% increased Elemental Burst DMG can be achieved this way.

%. A maximum of **50**
% increased Elemental Burst DMG can be achieved this way.

%. A maximum of **60**
% increased Elemental Burst DMG can be achieved this way.

%. A maximum of **70**
% increased Elemental Burst DMG can be achieved this way.

%. A maximum of **80**
